verbose_text: To confirm the perturbation of mRNA splicing, RT-PCR flanking exon 1 to 3 of both lrrc8a genes showed that aMO-e2i2 and bMO-e2i2 effectively disrupted the splicing of lrrc8aa (aa *, XREF_FIG A) and lrrc8ab (ab *, XREF_FIG B) mRNA, respectively.
evidence: bMO-e2i2 effectively disrupted the splicing of lrrc8aa (aa*,  XREF_FIG A) and lrrc8ab (ab*
